text: Tricholoma bakamatsutake is a mushroom of the agaric genus Tricholoma. Found in China and Japan, it was described as new to science by mycologist Tsuguo Hongo in 1974. It is closely related to the pine mushroom, Tricholoma matsutake, but occurs in Fagaceae forests (beeches and oaks) rather than pine forests. ==See also== *List of Tricholoma species ==References== ==External links== * bakamatsutake Category:Edible fungi Category:Fungi described in 1974 Category:Fungi of China Category:Fungi of Japan
title: Tricholoma bakamatsutake
